title: Mike Zhu
text:
I try to understand the ‘imperfection’ of humankind and how we play with uncertainty.


On my way to be a scientist.

 
  
   
  
    
     
  
  
    
     
  
  
    
     
  







Welcome to my website!
This website will be completed in a few days, consisting of the following three parts:

Psychology (Science, the left half brain above)
Photography (Art, the right half brain)
My life philosophy (Thoughts, the yellow question box in the center, a concept from Super Mario).

Currently almost all the links are replaced with a 404 page or my twitter page. I’m not gonna call it ‘X’ as Elon Musk wishes :(
Btw,this cover picture is made by myself :D I loveee it!! Story behind it will also be posted in a few days.
